Name: Field Pea (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Frühling. Wächst in 7 Tagen zu einem großen Busch heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden. Bringt manchmal mehrere Erbsen pro Ernte ein.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте весной. Через 7 дней вырастает куст гороха, который и после первого сбора будет продолжать плодоносить.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature into a large bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天种植。7天长成紫花豌豆丛。 在第一次收获后继续结果，有机会产出多个紫花豌豆。
